sources.title: Till The Clouds Roll by (1946), with Judy Garland and Frank Sinatra
sources.channelName: Public Domain Movies - Classic Old Movies

sources.title: Till the Clouds Roll By (1946)
sources.description: Light bio-pic of American Broadway pioneer Jerome Kern, featuring renditions of the famous songs from his musical plays by contemporary stage artists, including a condensed production of his most famous: 'Showboat'.

sources.title: Till The Clouds Roll By (1946) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]
sources.description: Till the clouds roll by is a 1946  black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab @ https://colab.research.google.com/  Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing: https://github.com/jantic/DeOldify A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS: https://rife-vfi.github.io  A.I. Upscaling to 4K: https://ffmpeg.org  GPU: Google Colab

sources.title: Till The Clouds Roll By
sources.description: Musical biopic on the career of pioneering Hollywood composer Jerome Kern. Starring June Allyson, Robert Walker, Lucille Bremer, Judy Garland, Lena Horne, Frank Sinatra

metadata.Plot: Light bio-pic of American Broadway pioneer Jerome Kern, featuring renditions of the famous songs from his musical plays by contemporary stage artists, including a condensed production of his most famous: 'Showboat'.
metadata.Writer: Guy Bolton, George Wells, Myles Connolly
metadata.Actors: Robert Walker, Van Heflin, Lucille Bremer
